definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
see 嬉皮笑臉|嬉皮笑脸[xi1 pi2 xiao4 lian3]

sentences.english: The next hip-hop dance move is to extend the right foot out.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的嘻哈舞步，是擴大了右腳。

sentences.english: The robot and I went into the computer room but Hee -Haw stayed outside.
sentences.chinese: 機器人和我進了電腦室，但“嘻嗬”留在外面。

sentences.english: The 34-year-old sonic guru naturally wanted to check out the hip-hop clubs Down Under.
sentences.chinese: 這位34歲的聲波大師自然想看看澳洲的嘻哈俱樂部。

sentences.english: The Hippies believed in free love and self expression.
sentences.chinese: 嘻皮們相信無拘束的愛及自我表現。

sentences.english: My favorite kind of music to dance to is hip hop.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的舞蹈音樂是嘻哈音樂。

sentences.english: Step out and turn toward your supporting leg for your hip hop side lunges.
sentences.chinese: 走出去，把對你的支持你的嘻哈邊腿弓步。

sentences.english: At the bottom of each comment on Xiha Life there’s a Translate button.
sentences.chinese: 在嘻哈生活每個回帖底部都有一個翻譯按鈕。

sentences.english: Innovative artists have given us cubism and hip-hop.
sentences.chinese: 富於革新的藝術家爲我們帶來了立體主義和嘻哈風潮。

sentences.english: No shouting or playing in the laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 實驗室不得大聲喧譁和嘻鬧。

sentences.english: Their music is a cross of reggae with hip hop.
sentences.chinese: 他們的音樂是雷鬼和嘻哈風格的組合。

sentences.english: I sat on Hee-Haw's back as the donkey walked on.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在“嘻嗬”的背上，驢子繼續往前走。

sentences.english: Schoolboys are fond of cutting up whenever they have a good opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 小學生一有機會就喜歡嘻鬧。

sentences.english: Hee-Haw sat on him while I did it.
sentences.chinese: 我綁的時候“嘻嗬”坐在他身上。

definition: denote a sound or sharp noise (gunfire etc)
to draw back the corners of one's mouth
onomat. for surprise, amazement and sigh
(onom.) expressing admiration or surprise/sound of a laugh
